data.name: Meiro Master
data.detailed_description:
Meiro Master is the tale of Russell, a young Golden Retriever with the dream of becoming the world-renowned Meiro Master. He has grown up watching the thrilling Meiro championships with his friends, with the hopes that one day he will use his skills to beat the regional Meiro champions and become the ultimate Meiro Master.

Compete in action-packed tournaments. The Meiro tournaments are the toughest tests that will use all of your skills and logic. Beating the regional Meiro champions will be a daunting test but nothing compares to the glory of competing on the worlds biggest stage. Earn the regional Meiro badges and you will be able to compete against the current Meiro Master Donte.

Earn your way in to the history books and fulfill your childhood dreams. Beat the competition and become the Meiro Master.



FEATURES
~ Explore beautiful locations- The regional Meiro champions are in different locations, which you can explore in an RPG style. The first location is the beautiful Midori City, the city were Russell grew up. In a 3rd person view, you will controlling Russell through the cities. Explore beautiful surroundings with Russell, each of the five cities that house the regional Miero champions are more stunning than the last. As you advance and venture further from Midori City, the cities start getting larger, with a lot more to explore.

Cities to Explore:
- Midori City
- Aoi Resort
- Mori Haven
- Yama Metropolis
- Sentai Hub
- Gōruden Capital



~ The Meiro Champions- In order to become the respected Meiro Master, you must first compete in the Meiro trials in Midori City. You will compete with other eager hopefuls to traverse the difficult mazes and beat the timer. If you beat your opponents and the time test, you will be able to start competing against the regional Meiro champions. In each city, a new regional Meiro champion awaits you. These Meiro champions are the best of the best and hold the badges for the regions. Your aim is to travel to each city and compete against the regional Meiro champion. If you beat them, you will earn their highly acclaimed Meiro badge. You must collect all of the Meiro badges from each city before you can compete against the Meiro Master Donte.

The Meiro champions to beat:
- Xavier
- Bella
- Lucious
- Shadow
- Arcada



~ The Meiro competitions- The Meiro games are intense and challenging 3D Mazes. You must navigate moving platforms, vast mazes and beat the time of the current Meiro champion to win the Meiro badges. All of the mazes are uniquely created for each region. The mazes are designed both vertically and horizontally, with the aim of getting to the finish line before you exceed the set time. The hardest part of mazes is that your choices matter, and taking the wrong turn can cause you to lose. Like traditional mazes, wrong turns lie behind every corner. With an exceptional twist, you will also have to dodge obsticles, skillfully traverse moving platforms, use your balance to move along ridges and do it all within the time of the current Meiro champion in order to win the Meiro badge.

~ Meet new friends- While exploring the different locations, Russell will encounter many friendly faces, as well as not so friendly. Talk with them to learn about the current Meiro champion and how you can beat them for the Meiro badge. They will tell you interesting facts about the city you are in, talk about the Meiro champions and engage in friendly talks.

data.short_description: An epic puzzle- platformer adventure with the goal of becoming the Meiro Master! Earn your way in to the history books and become the Meiro Master the people want!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 Bit Required. Windows 7 (SP1), Windows 8, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo, AMD Athlon 64 Dual-Core 4000+ or equivalent (For computers using built-in graphics chipsets, the game requires 2.0 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo, 2.0 GHz AMD Turion 64 X2 TL-62 or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB of Video RAM and support for Pixel Shader 3.0. Supported Video Cards: NVIDIA GeForce 6600 or better, ATI Radeon X1300 or better, Intel GMA X4500 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 17 GB available space

data.legal_notice: Meiro Master is solely owned by Space Sheep Gaming Ltd.
